uid.description: Unique identifier for the cart item

cart_uid.description: The cart that this item belongs to

quantity.description: Quantity of the product in the cart

unit_price.description: Price per unit of the product

total_price.description: Total price for this item (unit_price * quantity)

product_name.description: Name of the product at time of adding to cart

product_options.description: Selected options or variants for this product

notes.description: Optional notes specific to this item

created_at.description: The creation date and time of the cart item, in ISO 8601 format

updated_at.description: Updated date and time of the cart item, in ISO 8601 format
